instruction: Amlodipine (dose not specified) – patient currently takes for hypertension but reports occasionally forgetting to pick up refills.

attributes.sig: Dose not specified; patient currently takes for hypertension

instruction: Patient lives alone and reports inconsistent adherence to amlodipine, occasionally forgetting pharmacy pick-ups. Denies ankle or foot swelling. Complains of feeling more tired than usual (fatigue). Sleep quality and other recent changes under review.

attributes.narrative: Lives alone, inconsistently takes amlodipine and sometimes forgets pharmacy refills; denies ankle or foot swelling but reports increased fatigue, with sleep quality and other recent changes currently being evaluated.

instruction: Clinician advises patient to set phone reminders and use a pill organizer consistently to improve adherence to amlodipine.

coding.display: Education about use of pill box

attributes.comment: Please set phone reminders and use a pill organizer consistently to improve adherence to your amlodipine.
